Text:
Just to add to this a little... I installed it on a PC that never had the beta installed and activated successfully with a key from the keygen.

But then I tried to install it on my laptop (uninstalled beta first), and I don't even get the option to put a key in, because it says the beta's over before I can get to the key section.

In short, this only seems to work if you haven't installed the beta before.

Thanks a lot uploader!!
